4498 
4499 #define Randomize(n) (random_range(0, (n)-1))
4500 
4501 #define Protect(f) (cmdp->perms & f)
4502 
4503 #define Invalid_Objtype(x) ((Protect(CA_LOCATION) && !Has_location(x)) || (Protect(CA_CONTENTS) && !Has_contents(x)) || (Protect(CA_PLAYER) && (Typeof(x) != TYPE_PLAYER)))
4504 
4505 //#define safe_atoi(s) ((s == NULL) ? 0 : (int)strtol(s, (char **)NULL, 10))
4506 
4507 #define test_top() ((mudstate.qfirst != NULL) ? 1 : 0)
4508 #define controls(p, x) Controls(p, x)
4509 
4510 /*
4511  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------
4512  * Global data things.
4513  */
4514 
4515 #define Free_RegDataStruct(d) \
4516  if (d) \
4517  { \
4518  if ((d)->q_regs) \
4519  { \
4520  XFREE((d)->q_regs); \
4521  } \
4522  if ((d)->q_lens) \
4523  { \
4524  XFREE((d)->q_lens); \
4525  } \
4526  if ((d)->x_names) \
4527  { \
4528  XFREE((d)->x_names); \
4529  } \
4530  if ((d)->x_regs) \
4531  { \
4532  XFREE((d)->x_regs); \
4533  } \
4534  if ((d)->x_lens) \
4535  { \
4536  XFREE((d)->x_lens); \
4537  } \
4538  XFREE(d); \
4539  }
4540 
4541 #define Free_RegData(d) \
4542  { \
4543  int z; \
4544  if (d) \
4545  { \
4546  for (z = 0; z < (d)->q_alloc; z++) \
4547  { \
4548  if ((d)->q_regs[z]) \
4549  XFREE((d)->q_regs[z]); \
4550  } \
4551  for (z = 0; z < (d)->xr_alloc; z++) \
4552  { \
4553  if ((d)->x_names[z]) \
4554  XFREE((d)->x_names[z]); \
4555  if ((d)->x_regs[z]) \
4556  XFREE((d)->x_regs[z]); \
4557  } \
4558  Free_RegDataStruct(d); \
4559  } \
4560  }
4561 
4562 #define Free_QData(q) \
4563  XFREE((q)->text); \
4564  Free_RegDataStruct((q)->gdata);
4565 
4566 #define Init_RegData(f, t) \
4567  (t) = (GDATA *)XMALLOC(sizeof(GDATA), (f)); \
4568  (t)->q_alloc = (t)->xr_alloc = 0; \
4569  (t)->q_regs = (t)->x_names = (t)->x_regs = NULL; \
4570  (t)->q_lens = (t)->x_lens = NULL; \
4571  (t)->dirty = 0;
4572 
4573 #define Alloc_RegData(f, g, t) \
4574  if ((g) && ((g)->q_alloc || (g)->xr_alloc)) \
4575  { \
4576  (t) = (GDATA *)XMALLOC(sizeof(GDATA), (f)); \
4577  (t)->q_alloc = (g)->q_alloc; \
4578  if ((g)->q_alloc) \
4579  { \
4580  (t)->q_regs = XCALLOC((g)->q_alloc, sizeof(char *), "q_regs"); \
4581  (t)->q_lens = XCALLOC((g)->q_alloc, sizeof(int), "q_lens"); \
4582  } \
4583  else \
4584  { \
4585  (t)->q_regs = NULL; \
4586  (t)->q_lens = NULL; \
4587  } \
4588  (t)->xr_alloc = (g)->xr_alloc; \
4589  if ((g)->xr_alloc) \
4590  { \
4591  (t)->x_names = XCALLOC((g)->xr_alloc, sizeof(char *), "x_names"); \
4592  (t)->x_regs = XCALLOC((g)->xr_alloc, sizeof(char *), "x_regs"); \
4593  (t)->x_lens = XCALLOC((g)->xr_alloc, sizeof(int), "x_lens"); \
4594  } \
4595  else \
4596  { \
4597  (t)->x_names = NULL; \
4598  (t)->x_regs = NULL; \
4599  (t)->x_lens = NULL; \
4600  } \
4601  (t)->dirty = 0; \
4602  } \
4603  else \
4604  { \
4605  (t) = NULL; \
4606  }
4607 
4608 /* Copy global data from g to t */
4609 
4610 #define Copy_RegData(f, g, t) \
4611  { \
4612  int z; \
4613  if ((g) && (g)->q_alloc) \
4614  { \
4615  for (z = 0; z < (g)->q_alloc; z++) \
4616  { \
4617  if ((g)->q_regs[z] && *((g)->q_regs[z])) \
4618  { \
4619  (t)->q_regs[z] = XMALLOC(LBUF_SIZE, f); \
4620  memcpy((t)->q_regs[z], (g)->q_regs[z], (g)->q_lens[z] + 1); \
4621  (t)->q_lens[z] = (g)->q_lens[z]; \
4622  } \
4623  } \
4624  } \
4625  if ((g) && (g)->xr_alloc) \
4626  { \
4627  for (z = 0; z < (g)->xr_alloc; z++) \
4628  { \
4629  if ((g)->x_names[z] && *((g)->x_names[z]) && \
4630  (g)->x_regs[z] && *((g)->x_regs[z])) \
4631  { \
4632  (t)->x_names[z] = XMALLOC(SBUF_SIZE, "glob.x_name"); \
4633  strcpy((t)->x_names[z], (g)->x_names[z]); \
4634  (t)->x_regs[z] = XMALLOC(LBUF_SIZE, "glob.x_reg"); \
4635  memcpy((t)->x_regs[z], (g)->x_regs[z], (g)->x_lens[z] + 1); \
4636  (t)->x_lens[z] = (g)->x_lens[z]; \
4637  } \
4638  } \
4639  } \
4640  if (g) \
4641  (t)->dirty = (g)->dirty; \
4642  else \
4643  (t)->dirty = 0; \
4644  }
4645 
4646 /*
4647  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------
4648  * Module things.
4649  */
4650 
4651 /*
4652  * Syntax: CALL_ALL_MODULES(<name of function>, (<args>)) Call all modules
4653  * defined for this symbol.
4654  */
4655 
4656 #define CALL_ALL_MODULES(xfn, args) \
4657  { \
4658  MODULE *cam__mp; \
4659  for (cam__mp = mudstate.modules_list; cam__mp != NULL; cam__mp = cam__mp->next) \
4660  { \
4661  if (cam__mp->xfn) \
4662  { \
4663  (*(cam__mp->xfn)) args; \
4664  } \
4665  } \
4666  }
4667 
4668 /*
4669  * Syntax: CALL_SOME_MODULES(<return value variable>, <name of function>,
4670  * (<args>)) Call modules in sequence until we get back a non-zero value.
4671  */
4672 
4673 #define CALL_SOME_MODULES(rv, xfn, args) \
4674  { \
4675  MODULE *csm__mp; \
4676  for (csm__mp = mudstate.modules_list, rv = 0; (csm__mp != NULL) && !rv; csm__mp = csm__mp->next) \
4677  { \
4678  if (csm__mp->xfn) \
4679  { \
4680  rv = (*(csm__mp->xfn))args; \
4681  } \
4682  } \
4683  }
4684 
4685 /*
4686  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------
4687  * String things.
4688  */
4689 
4690 /*
4691  * Copies a string, and sets its length, not including the terminating null
4692  * character, in another variable. Note that it is assumed that the source
4693  * string is null-terminated. Takes: string to copy to, string to copy from,
4694  * length (pointer to int)
4695  */
4696 
4697 #define StrCopyLen(scl__dest, scl__src, scl__len) \
4698  *(scl__len) = strlen(scl__src); \
4699  memcpy(scl__dest, scl__src, (int)*(scl__len) + 1);
4700 
4701 /*
4702  * Copies a string of known length, and null-terminates it. Takes: pointer to
4703  * copy to, pointer to copy from, length
4704  */
4705 
4706 #define StrCopyKnown(scl__dest, scl__src, scl__len) \
4707  memcpy(scl__dest, scl__src, scl__len); \
4708  scl__dest[scl__len] = '\0';
4709 
4710 /* Various macros for writing common string sequences. */
4711 
4712 //#define safe_crlf(b, p) safe_strncat((b), (p), "\r\n", 2, LBUF_SIZE)
4713 //#define safe_ansi_normal(b, p) safe_strncat((b), (p), ANSI_NORMAL, 4, LBUF_SIZE)
4714 //#define safe_nothing(b, p) safe_strncat((b), (p), "#-1", 3, LBUF_SIZE)
4715 //#define safe_noperm(b, p) safe_strncat((b), (p), "#-1 PERMISSION DENIED", 21, LBUF_SIZE)
4716 //#define safe_nomatch(b, p) safe_strncat((b), (p), "#-1 NO MATCH", 12, LBUF_SIZE)
4717 //#define safe_bool(b, p, n) safe_chr(((n) ? '1' : '0'), (b), (p))
4718 
4719 #define safe_dbref(b, p, n) \
4720  SAFE_LB_CHR('#', (b), (p)); \
4721  SAFE_LTOS((b), (p), (n), LBUF_SIZE);
4722 
4723 #endif /* __EXTERNS_H */

4729 
4730 #ifndef __STRINGUTIL_H
4731 #define __STRINGUTIL_H
4732 
4733 #define STRING_EMPTY ""
4734 
4740 #define BEEP_CHAR '\07'
4741 #define ESC_CHAR '\033'
4742 
4743 #define ANSI_CSI '['
4744 #define ANSI_END 'm'
4745 
4746 #define ANSI_NORMAL "\033[0m"
4747 
4748 #define ANSI_REVERSE_NORMAL "m0[\033"
4749 #define ANSI_REVERSE_HIRED "m13[\033m1[\033"
4750 
4751 #define ANSI_HILITE "\033[1m"
4752 #define ANSI_INVERSE "\033[7m"
4753 #define ANSI_BLINK "\033[5m"
4754 #define ANSI_UNDER "\033[4m"
4755 
4756 #define ANSI_INV_BLINK "\033[7;5m"
4757 #define ANSI_INV_HILITE "\033[1;7m"
4758 #define ANSI_BLINK_HILITE "\033[1;5m"
4759 #define ANSI_INV_BLINK_HILITE "\033[1;5;7m"
4760 
4766 #define ANSI_BLACK "\033[30m"
4767 #define ANSI_RED "\033[31m"
4768 #define ANSI_GREEN "\033[32m"
4769 #define ANSI_YELLOW "\033[33m"
4770 #define ANSI_BLUE "\033[34m"
4771 #define ANSI_MAGENTA "\033[35m"
4772 #define ANSI_CYAN "\033[36m"
4773 #define ANSI_WHITE "\033[37m"
4774 
4775 #define ANSI_XTERM_FG "\033[38;5;"
4776 
4782 #define ANSI_BBLACK "\033[40m"
4783 #define ANSI_BRED "\033[41m"
4784 #define ANSI_BGREEN "\033[42m"
4785 #define ANSI_BYELLOW "\033[43m"
4786 #define ANSI_BBLUE "\033[44m"
4787 #define ANSI_BMAGENTA "\033[45m"
4788 #define ANSI_BCYAN "\033[46m"
4789 #define ANSI_BWHITE "\033[47m"
4790 
4791 #define ANSI_XTERM_BG "\033[48;5;"
4792 
4798 #define N_ANSI_NORMAL "0"
4799 #define N_ANSI_HILITE "1"
4800 #define N_ANSI_INVERSE "7"
4801 #define N_ANSI_BLINK "5"
4802 #define N_ANSI_UNDER "4"
4803 
4804 #define N_ANSI_BLACK "30"
4805 #define N_ANSI_RED "31"
4806 #define N_ANSI_GREEN "32"
4807 #define N_ANSI_YELLOW "33"
4808 #define N_ANSI_BLUE "34"
4809 #define N_ANSI_MAGENTA "35"
4810 #define N_ANSI_CYAN "36"
4811 #define N_ANSI_WHITE "37"
4812 
4813 #define N_ANSI_BBLACK "40"
4814 #define N_ANSI_BRED "41"
4815 #define N_ANSI_BGREEN "42"
4816 #define N_ANSI_BYELLOW "43"
4817 #define N_ANSI_BBLUE "44"
4818 #define N_ANSI_BMAGENTA "45"
4819 #define N_ANSI_BCYAN "46"
4820 #define N_ANSI_BWHITE "47"
4821

4823 
4829 #define I_ANSI_NORMAL 0
4830 
4831 #define I_ANSI_HILITE 1
4832 #define I_ANSI_INVERSE 7
4833 #define I_ANSI_BLINK 5
4834 #define I_ANSI_UNDER 4
4835 
4836 #define I_ANSI_BLACK 30
4837 #define I_ANSI_RED 31
4838 #define I_ANSI_GREEN 32
4839 #define I_ANSI_YELLOW 33
4840 #define I_ANSI_BLUE 34
4841 #define I_ANSI_MAGENTA 35
4842 #define I_ANSI_CYAN 36
4843 #define I_ANSI_WHITE 37
4844 
4845 #define I_ANSI_BBLACK 40
4846 #define I_ANSI_BRED 41
4847 #define I_ANSI_BGREEN 42
4848 #define I_ANSI_BYELLOW 43
4849 #define I_ANSI_BBLUE 44
4850 #define I_ANSI_BMAGENTA 45
4851 #define I_ANSI_BCYAN 46
4852 #define I_ANSI_BWHITE 47
4853 
4854 #define I_ANSI_NUM 48
4855 #define I_ANSI_LIM 50
4856 
4857 #define ANST_NORMAL 0x0099
4858 #define ANST_NONE 0x1099
4859 
4865 #define TRACK_ESCCODES(s, ansi_state) \
4866  do \
4867  { \
4868  int ansi_mask = 0; \
4869  int ansi_diff = 0; \
4870  unsigned int param_val = 0; \
4871  \
4872  ++(s); \
4873  if (*(s) == ANSI_CSI) \
4874  { \
4875  while ((*(++(s)) & 0xf0) == 0x30) \
4876  { \
4877  if (*(s) < 0x3a) \
4878  { \
4879  param_val <<= 1; \
4880  param_val += (param_val << 2) + (*(s)&0x0f); \
4881  } \
4882  else \
4883  { \
4884  if (param_val < I_ANSI_LIM) \
4885  { \
4886  ansi_mask |= ansiBitsMask(param_val); \
4887  ansi_diff = ((ansi_diff & ~ansiBitsMask(param_val)) | \
4888  ansiBits(param_val)); \
4889  } \
4890  param_val = 0; \
4891  } \
4892  } \
4893  } \
4894  while ((*(s)&0xf0) == 0x20) \
4895  { \
4896  ++(s); \
4897  } \
4898  if (*(s) == ANSI_END) \
4899  { \
4900  if (param_val < I_ANSI_LIM) \
4901  { \
4902  ansi_mask |= ansiBitsMask(param_val); \
4903  ansi_diff = ((ansi_diff & ~ansiBitsMask(param_val)) | \
4904  ansiBits(param_val)); \
4905  } \
4906  ansi_state = (ansi_state & ~ansi_mask) | ansi_diff; \
4907  ++(s); \
4908  } \
4909  else if (*(s)) \
4910  { \
4911  ++(s); \
4912  } \
4913  } while (0)
4914 
4915 #define TRACK_ALL_ESCCODES(s, p, ansi_state) \
4916  do \
4917  { \
4918  (p) = (s); \
4919  while (*(p)) \
4920  { \
4921  if (*(p) == ESC_CHAR) \
4922  { \
4923  TRACK_ESCCODES((p), (ansi_state)); \
4924  } \
4925  else \
4926  { \
4927  ++(p); \
4928  } \
4929  } \
4930  } while (0)
4931 
4932 
4933 #endif /* __STRINGUTIL_H */
4934 
4935 /*
4936  * From prototypes.h
4937  */
4938 
4939 #ifndef __PROTOTYPES_H
4940 #define __PROTOTYPES_H
